description:
Furuta Nimura is a Rank 1 http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator].
He was originally Washuu-Furuta Souta, the illegitimate son of former http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG] Chairman http://anidb.net/ch96193 [Washuu Tsuneyoshi] and an agent of http://anidb.net/ch98950 [V] raised in the Sunlit Garden. While working as a Rank 1 Ghoul Investigator, he used the alias of Furuta Nimura.
To further his own agenda, he has used various identities to infiltrate organizations or build personal alliances. As a member of the http://anidb.net/ch95833 [Clowns], he goes by the name Souta and was responsible for the Steel Beam Incident. He also joined the Ghoul Restaurant as PG, and has been a partner in http://anidb.net/ch68389 [Kanou Akihiro]`s ghoulification experiments. Like http://anidb.net/ch65636 [Kaneki Ken], he is an artificial one-eyed ghoul who possesses http://anidb.net/ch65638 [Kamishiro Rize]`s kagune.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Furuta Nimura
